entity.name: Yamiche Alcindor
entity.description: American journalist; White House correspondent for PBS NewsHour

text:
@weijia @Yamiche Trump screwed up our response to COVID-19 and 122,000 Americans have died.

Projections say another 90,000 will die by Oct. first.

Is Trump working on a system to prevent these deaths? 

No.

He’s talking about doing less.

Trump is the worst mass murderer in US history
